articles.author: Heather Chen, CNN
articles.title: China calls on Myanmar's junta to hold talks with opponents - CNN
articles.description: China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi has called on Myanmar's junta leaders to talk to their opponents amid concerns over escalating violence and deteriorating rights conditions in the Southeast Asian country.
